channel.title: Annie Smith: Quilting Stash
channel.description: A twice-weekly quilting audio blog post by Annie Smith in mp3
channel.copyright: Copyright 2005 Annie Smith - all rights reserved

image.title: Quilting Stash
image.description: Welcome to Quilting Stash - bringing you scraps of information and ideas for your quilting pleasure.

channel.itunes:author: Annie Smith
channel.itunes:summary: The world's first Podcast for quilter's is here. Created by Annie Smith, quilter, author, and lecturer, for quilters of all interest levels. Annie provides insight to the world of traditional, modern, and art quilting by discussing process, news, events, and products related to quilting. In her show, Annie takes you to quilt shows, stores, and even seminars to see what's new and interview quilting's best and least known personalities.
channel.itunes:keywords: quilting, stash, fabric, sewing, crafts, hobby, textile, sewing machine, Annie Smith

item.title: Show 213
item.description:
Podcast Number 213

Be sure to visit my website at www.simplearts.com to see the accompanying blog including pictures and other information that I mention!

Happy Quilting!

©2011 Annie Smith and SimpleArts
